mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_ID, CREATED_AT, VIEW_COUNT ) VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{writerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID AS boardId, b.TITLE AS title, b.CONTENT AS content, b.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, b.VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount, u.NICKNAME AS writerId FROM BOARD b JOIN USER_INFO u ON b.WRITER_ID = u.ID ORDER BY b.BOARD_ID DESC
